title: recent update changes 4/22/2021
content: Today 4/22/2021 I updated my FIREFOX Browser. WHY did FF get rid of the option to block cookies and block persistent storage for each webpage you are on? Before you could right click and choose view page info which allowed you to BLOCK individual choices .... WHY FF WHY? How can we change this or is there another way to still do it?
